channel.title: Projects on Slumdown
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Slumdown

item.title: Sabbatical Diary 2017
item.description: 10 May - Final exam in stat - installed “yarrr” and “dplyr” on laptop for use this Summer. 16 May Enrolled in Coursera Pyhon for Data Science and Qualitative methods courses. 17 May The Coursera Python course is a bit much for now, so I am going back to Chuck Severance’s PY4E videos. We will see if I can make enough progress to do the course by the time it ‘officially’ begins.

item.title: A kunoichi page
item.description: A simple project page illustrating how user-defined themes in slumdown can be used as the basis of individual pages and ggplot2 figures. It doesn’t do very much.
